author: jgm
content:
I can think of three causes of slashing:
  1) individual validator failure (e.g. double voting due to misconfigured HA setup)
  2) client failure (i.e. bug in prysm/lighthouse/whatever)
  3) attack

I suspect we'll see a spate of 1), and none of 3).  Hoping we never see 2), but that's the one with the biggest combined (probability * impact).
